altername_name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 15: The Block Kuzushi: Cyborg 009
Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol.15 Cyborg 009 The Block Kuzushi
name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 15: The Block Kuzushi: Cyborg 009
overview: Simple Characters 2000 Series vol.15 - The Block Kuzushi is a breakout game featuring characters of the manga series, an unlockable picture gallery and 2 game modes: - Story mode: Advance through the story passing the game stages. - Survival mode: Only one live to complete the stages. The gameplay is the classic in a breakout game, the player has to keep the ball moving to destroy all the blocks in each stage, there are a special power gauge that get filled destroying the blocks, and there are also some undestructible bricks.
